Html:
Hi Eugine,

My approach in using FLEE is by On-demand variables. However during variable type resolution it requires me to specify the type :

static void variables_ResolveVariableType(object sender, ResolveVariableTypeEventArgs e)
{
  // Make all variables Doubles
  e.VariableType = typeof(double);
}

 Now since conditional statement supports strings, then this would create problem if we use the following formulas:

  if (var1="One", result+1, result+2)

 Consider var1 is expected to be a string, result is expected to be a double

Question : How can we dynamically give the e.VariableType during resolution of variable type?
(so that var1 will be automatically identified as a string type and result is identified as double.)

 Thanks in advance
